sentence.Network_en: The committee will need to winnow out the nonsense and produce more practical proposals if it is to achieve results.
sentence.Network_cn: 委员会若要取得成果，需要摈除不着边际的观点，提出更实际的建议。

sentence.Network_en: You should winnow out the inaccuracies of this paper this afternoon.
sentence.Network_cn: 你今天下午把这篇文章中不精确的内容删掉.

sentence.Network_en: And tonight, we winnow to 100 and finally to number one.
sentence.Network_cn: 今晚, 我们精选了100句电影台词,一一展示,直到排名第一的台词.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English windwian, from wind (see wind)

entry.def: If you winnow a group of things or people, you reduce its size by separating the ones that are useful or relevant from the ones that are not.

example.ex: Administration officials have winnowed the list of candidates to three.
example.tran: 行政官员将候选名单筛减至3人。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of separating grain from chaff;

sentences.sentence: "She stood there winnowing grain all day in the field"

means.word_mean: 3. treat by exposure to a current of air so that waste matter is eliminated;
4. remove by a current of air;

auth_sentence.content: Similar to football's Punt, Pass and Kick, the program will winnow entrants through local and regional qualifiers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Similar to football's Punt, Pass and Kick, the program will winnow entrants through local and regional qualifiers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Similar to football's Punt, Pass and Kick, the program will winnow entrants through local and regional qualifiers.

auth_sentence.content: Their fears may not be far off the mark, as more companies rely on technology to winnow out less-qualified candidates.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their fears may not be far off the mark, as more companies rely on technology to winnow out less-qualified candidates.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their fears may not be far off the mark, as more companies rely on technology to winnow out less-qualified candidates.

auth_sentence.content: Four hundred and six teams of architects responded, and in September a panel of advisers was selected to winnow the list.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Four hundred and six teams of architects responded, and in September a panel of advisers was selected to winnow the list.
